name: Domestic R&D performed by the company, by firm classification of race and ethnicity and employment size, for companies with R&D expenditures and 1–9 employees: 2019
description: Domestic R&D performed by the company, by firm classification of race and ethnicity and employment size, for companies with R&D expenditures and 1–9 employees: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: race_and_ethnicity_of_owners
variableMeasured.description: Race and ethnicity of owners hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_all_companies_companies_number_
variableMeasured.unitText: Number and thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_all_companies_amount
variableMeasured.unitText: Number and thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_1_4_employees_companies_number_
variableMeasured.unitText: Number and thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_1_4_employees_amount
variableMeasured.unitText: Number and thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_5_9_employees_companies_number_
variableMeasured.unitText: Number and thousands of U.S. dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_5_9_employees_amount
variableMeasured.unitText: Number and thousands of U.S. dollars

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Companies may be included in one or more race and ethnicity category. Companies classified as "minority" are those companies classified as any race and ethnicity combination other than White, not of Hispanic origin. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States that performed or funded R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2020 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2019.
